-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Behaviour Expressions for TorXakis
--   
--   Behaviour Expressions for TorXakis
@package behaveenv
@version 0.1.7.0

module EnvBTree

-- | IOB : behaviour environment state monad transformer projection of IOC
--   that are necessary in BTree manipulation
type IOB a = StateT EnvB IO a
data EnvB
EnvB :: Map String SmtEnv -> TxsDefs -> Sigs VarId -> StateNr -> Params -> Id -> [Msg] -> EnvB

-- | Named smt solver envs
[smts] :: EnvB -> Map String SmtEnv

-- | TorXakis definitions
[tdefs] :: EnvB -> TxsDefs
[sigs] :: EnvB -> Sigs VarId

-- | Current beh statenr
[stateid] :: EnvB -> StateNr

-- | Parameters
[params] :: EnvB -> Params

-- | Last used unique number
[unid] :: EnvB -> Id

-- | (error) reporting
[msgs] :: EnvB -> [Msg]

-- | Add messages to IOB Monad.
putMsgs :: [Msg] -> IOB ()

-- | Get the function defined at in the current state.
getFuncDefs :: IOB (Map FuncId (FuncDef VarId))

-- | Get the SMT solver.
getSMT :: String -> IOB SmtEnv

-- | Set the SMT solver.
putSMT :: String -> SmtEnv -> IOB ()
